nodes.text: The Brodogon system was a star system that was located within the Bozhnee sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and Western Reaches regions. It was the origin point of the Brodogon Consortium.
The Brodogon system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-18.
